name: Garden Gacha
description:
You are a space farmer who make veggies grow for a living. Buy seeds, combine plants to optimise their quality and develop your space garden. But be careful, you never know what you're buying ! 
This game was created for a VR school project and plants combinations are based on real plants interactions, so you could learn little things about gardening while playing. 

Credits :

  • Baptiste "Crousti" David : game developper, game designer
  • Benjamin "BenJ" Farigoul : game developper, game designer, 3D asset modeler
  • Erwan "Aikeon" Senechal : game developper, game designer
  • Mathieu "Furtana" Simon : game developper, game designer, sound designer
